```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r BRT data}
# Table 1 - BRT data for each city - combined statistics in csv file


```

```{r pollutant data, Tables 2 and 3}

historicas_series <- read_delim("historicas_series.csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)
historicas_series_2 <- read_delim("pollutants/historicas_series_2.csv", 
    ";", escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)

combined_data <- merge(historicas_series, historicas_series_2)
 
 
Table_2 <- combined_data %>%
  select(combined_data$Regiao, filter (-`Curitiba - PR`, -`Grande Vitoria - ES`, -`Rio de Janeiro - RJ`, -`Salvador - BA`))

```
